name: Man-Made Angel
short_description: Man-Made Angel is a very generic, full-length adventure/fantasy/comedy fiction in progress by Daniel Sim (foxhead128), coded in LaTeX. It is released under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. Man-Made Angel surely isn't finished yet, and the source code available from the project's Git repository is subject to vast changes at the author's will. Published chapters (which are also subject to change) are available at http://foxhead128.deviantart.com/gallery/36710096
summary: A very generic adventure/fantasy/comedy fiction, coded in LaTeX.
